items.title: Skillful Parenting Program
items.description: A comprehensive program designed to empower parents and caregivers with positive parenting practices to enhance child development and family well-being.

items.title: Family Budgeting
items.description: A module focused on money management, helping families reduce financial stress and improve their financial decision-making.

items.title: Tailored Training Services
items.description: Customized training sessions for individuals and organizations to meet specific needs in parenting and family support.

items.title: Skillful Parenting Guide
items.description: Explore our guide that covers essential modules on parenting, family communication, positive discipline, and child protection.

items.title: Collaborative Partnerships
items.description: Discover how we work with organizations to end violence in families.

items.title: Support Skilful Parenting
items.description: Help us improve family lives and protect children and women from violence.

items.title: Who We Are
items.description: Improving Cambodiaâ€™s Society through Skilful Parenting (ICS-SP) is a national non-profit organization established in July 2015. We aim to enhance family lives to positively impact the well-being of children and women. Our collaborative approach enables us to work effectively with partners and participants in our mission.

items.title: Our Mission
items.description: ICS-SP is dedicated to ending family violence and improving the well-being of children and women in Cambodia through collaborative efforts and skillful parenting programs.

items.title: Our Vision
items.description: We envision a society where every family thrives in a violence-free environment, fostering positive relationships and ensuring a safe and nurturing space for children and women.

items.title: Get in Touch with Us
items.description: Reach out to ICS-SP to collaborate or learn more about our initiatives to improve family lives and prevent violence through skillful parenting.
